rooms.name: Home Office
infoModalText: For those who have a dedicated home office, it’s essential to design it in a way that lets you work as efficiently and securely as any corporate office—not to mention, more comfortably.
With the luxury of a little extra space, you can outfit your home office with devices that give you the flexibility to take one meeting at your desk and another on a bigger screen.

rooms.name: Kitchen Room
infoModalText: Not everyone has the luxury of a dedicated home office. For many of us, our kitchens have become our place to work. These tight—and often temporary workspaces—also include a recipe of distractions, noise, and guest appearances.
But when you mix portable collaboration devices with noise-cancelling headsets and a sprinkle of secure wireless connectivity, voila! Your kitchen becomes a productive powerhouse.
